generalHospital.mainBody: This is a gentle reminder that one of your patients has a blood test that is due soon. We kindly ask you to ensure they schedule an appointment with you as soon as possible.--br----br--Please see details below for more information.

generalPatient.mainBody: This is a gentle reminder that you have a blood test that is due soon. We kindly ask you to schedule an appointment at your preferred hospital as soon as possible.--br----br--Please see details below for more information.

generalCarer.mainBody: This is a gentle reminder that a patient you are responsible for has a blood test that is due soon. We kindly ask you to schedule an appointment for them at their preferred hospital as soon as possible.--br----br--Please see details below for more information.

subject.title: Reminder for an overdue blood test -

overdueHospital.mainBody: This is a gentle reminder that one of your patients has missed their recent blood test. We kindly ask you to ensure they schedule an appointment with you as soon as possible and attend the appointment.--br----br--Please see details below for more information.

subject.title: Reminder for your overdue blood test -

overduePatient.mainBody: This is a gentle reminder about a recent blood test that you have missed. We kindly ask you to schedule an appointment at your preferred hospital as soon as possible and ensure you attend the appointment.--br----br--Please see details below for more information.

subject.title: Reminder for an overdue blood test -

overdueCarer.mainBody: This is a gentle reminder that a patient you are responsible for has missed their recent blood test. We kindly ask you to schedule an appointment at their preferred hospital for them as soon as possible and ensure they attend the appointment.--br----br--Please see details below for more information.

recoveryEmail.subject: Password recovery email
recoveryEmail.mainBody: You have requested to recover your password for Blood Test Diary system. Please use your username and the new password below to login. You can modify the password once you are logged in.--br----br--If you did not request to recover your password, please, report this to your administrator as soon as possible.
